-e ---

𒌝𒈠 pheme "say thus" 𓅓 𓂝 𓎡 ( بومة būma 𓅓 ) 𒌝𒈠 woman ⇔ gymna
𒌝𒈠 umma Amme : mother
𒌝𒈠 mot 𒀀𒆳 ᵠamat

𒌝𒈨 eme2 |UM.ME| Amme "wet nurse" Akk. mušēniqtu

𒌝𒈠 Oma : old lady ⇔ Dame
𒌝𒈠 Omm : "Mark my speech" …

eme2 𒌝𒈨 |UM.ME| Amme "wet nurse" Akk. mušēniqtu emeda 𒌝𒈨 Amme, mother ummeda 𒌝𒈨 Amme, mother emedada 𒌝𒈨𒁕 Amme, mother ummedada 𒌝𒈨𒁕 Amme, mother emeda3 𒎘𒁕 Amme, mother emeda 𒌼𒈨𒁕 Amme, mother
